overview.en: The HCT(HCoin Token) team will make a revolutionary transformation of the existing irrational ecosystem, build a decentralized platform through blockchain technology, subvert the existing live industry operating model, with a fair value recognition and value distribution mechanism, The economic incentive system itself becomes a system that can circulate within the system. The vision of the HCT (HCoin Token) red coin is to establish a truly decentralized live social platform through blockchain technology to achieve real-time community-based autonomy. Sharing content, social and circle building, through subversive value recognition and value distribution mechanism, allows all participants to directly obtain value from the other side in the ecology.
overview.zh: HCT(红币)团队将对现有的不合理的生态系统做一个革命性的改造，通过区块链技术构建去中心化平台，颠覆现有直播行业的运营模式，以公平的价值认可及价值分配机制，将 经济激励系统本身变为能够在系统内循环的体系.HCT（HCoin Token）红币的愿景是通过区块链技术建立一个真正意义上的去中心化直播社交平台，以社区化自治的方式实现实时分容分享，社交和圈子的建立，通过颠覆性的价值认可及价值分配机制，让所有参与者在生态中可直接获得来自对方的价值肯定。
